short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display bitcoin price in Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to display real-time Bitcoin prices (Coinbase and Mt. Gox exchanges) on Google search results page. Prices displayed whenever search query contains 'bitcoin'.
